DESCRIPTION.P: This block realizes a SISO linear system represented by its rational transfer function whose numerator and denominator roots are tabulated functions of the second block input. The rational function must be proper.
Roots are interpolated linearly between mesh points.

ITEMIZE.label: DIALOGUE PARAMETERS
ITEMIZE.ITEM: : a vector which defines u2 mesh points. Numerator roots : a matrix, each line gives the roots of the numerator at the corresponding mesh point.
: a matrix, each line gives the roots of the denominator at the corresponding mesh point.
: a vector, each vector entry gives the transfer gain at the corresponding mesh point.
: a vector of initial value of past degree(Numerator) inputs
: a vector of initial value of past degree(Denominator) outputs
